title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment and the 
Department of Climate, Energy and the Environment) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department enterprise tourism employment department climate energy environment) order 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. 

Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the 
Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment with effect from 25 
February 2025.
text_norm: 2 jenny mccormack particular whose address deposited office department enterprise tourism employment appointed special adviser alan dillon minister state department enterprise tourism employment effect 25 february 2025

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
heading: Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. 

Jenny McCormack, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, is 
appointed to be a Special Adviser to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the 
Department of Climate, Energy and the Environment with effect from 25 
February 2025. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 July, 2025. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Tánaiste. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [304] 3
